actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain individuals from being appointed to positions if the individual worked, as part of that individual's employment with the United States, on behalf of a special counsel investigation that investigated or prosecuted a President or a candidates for election to the office of President.
short_title: Restore Integrity of Special Prosecutors Act
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text:
Restore Integrity of Special Prosecutors Act

This bill bars an individual who has worked for a special counsel investigation or prosecution targeting a President or presidential candidate from serving in a position that requires the advice and consent of the Senate. This prohibition shall last for seven years from the end of the individual's work with the special counsel.

titles.title: Restore Integrity of Special Prosecutors Act
Restore Integrity of Special Prosecutors Act

A bill to prohibit certain individuals from being appointed to positions if the individual worked, as part of that individual's employment with the United States, on behalf of a special counsel investigation that investigated or prosecuted a President or a candidates for election to the office of President.
